GeneDef.label: protective leprosy
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have an immune defense mechanism that sheds infected organs and body parts, preventing the disease from spreading further.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Whenever an <color=#8a8ae6>infection</color> on a bodypart is 80-100%, the <color=#8a8ae6>bodypart is destroyed</color>, preventing the pawn's death via infection. It have ~2 days cooldown.
